籤詩版本二:
Kuzvarwa mumhuri yakapfuma kubva paudiki, zvese zviri pamberi pangu zvinogara zvine umbozha
Bhandi rePpuru reGoridhe Makapihwa naMambo wenyu, richava nemukurumbira pasi rose
詩意:
Hexagram iyi chiratidzo chekuti dhiragoni rinogona kuvhurwa.
Zvinhu zvese zvichachinja kuita zvirinani.
解曰: Vasungwa vanoregererwa. Kurwara zvinoreva rugare. Longmen ane mukana wekusangana. Yakakurumbira muguta guru rose.
籤詩故事一:
◇Luo Tong anomuremekedza
Tang Dynasty yakanyatso kuungana kuti inyaradze Fan yeKumaodzanyemba. Emperor Taizong vakafunga kutungamira rwendo urwu vari vega, asi vakabatwa muMuyang City, saka Cheng Yaojin akadzokera kuCentral Plains kunonunura mauto. Cheng Yaojin aitaura uye aitaura. Princess Tu Lu wekuBeifan akavimbisa kumubvumira kudzokera kuCentral Plains kunokumbira kusimbiswa.
Mumakwikwi ehondo, vakuru vemauto kuti vakunde kuchamhembe vakapinzwa basa.Luo Tong ane makore gumi nemanomwe ekuberekwa akabuda pamusoro ndokutora hutungamiri hwerwendo rwekuchamhembe.
(Dimikira rekuti "Luotong anotsvaira kuchamhembe" dimikira rejaya rakabudirira)
聖意: Nyengeterera imba neimba, zvinyengeterere, namatira pfuma, rombo rakanaka mumatsutso nechando, rombo rakanaka mubhizinesi, muchato, uye rombo rakanaka muLiujia, vakadzi vanofamba netsoka, namatira kuchengetedzwa kweminda, makonye esirika, nhanho yepakati, zvipfuyo zvitanhatu. , nhanho yepakati, kutsvaga vanhu, mhosva dzeveruzhinji, kutama kwakakodzera, kuchengetedza pfuma yakarasika, Zvirwere zvekumabvazuva, Anshan guva rakashata
